trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs is constructed and passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: O SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs é construído e passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>eventos quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>métodos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle no modo virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the search is a text search.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a pesquisa é uma pesquisa de texto.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the search is a prefix search.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a pesquisa é uma pesquisa de prefixo.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to include subitems of list items in the search.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se deve ser incluída subitens de itens da lista na pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The text of the item to search for.
trans-unit.target: O texto do item a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> no qual iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> no qual iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction from the current item that the search should take place.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a direção do item atual que a pesquisa deve ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: Identifying the nearest item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on; therefore, the search direction is a hint, and not an absolute guarantee of results.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o item mais próximo em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle pode variar dependendo do sistema operacional que o aplicativo está em execução no; portanto, a direção de pesquisa é uma dica e não uma garantia absoluta de resultados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the search should include subitems of list items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a pesquisa deve incluir subitens de itens da lista.

trans-unit.source: Subitems are typically used when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> view.
trans-unit.target: Subitens são normalmente usadas quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>está em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if subitems should be included in the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se subitens devem ser incluídos na pesquisa; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> encontrado no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> .

trans-unit.source: Set the Index property to the index of the item matching the search criteria when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade de índice para o índice do item que correspondem aos critérios de pesquisa ao tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> encontrado no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the search should return an item if its text starts with the search text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a pesquisa deve retornar um item se o texto começa com o texto de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A> property can specify a substring of the desired text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A>propriedade pode especificar uma subcadeia de caracteres do texto desejado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsPrefixSearch property indicates whether the search should match items that start with the search text.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsPrefixSearch indica se a pesquisa deve corresponder os itens que começam com o texto de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the search should match item text that starts with the search text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a pesquisa deve corresponder item texto que começa com o texto de pesquisa; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the search is a text search.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a pesquisa é uma pesquisa de texto.

trans-unit.source: You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pesquisar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle por local usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>método, ou você pode executar uma pesquisa de texto usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the search is a text search; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the search is a location search.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a pesquisa é uma pesquisa de texto; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a pesquisa é uma pesquisa de local.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> where the search starts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> onde a pesquisa inicia.

trans-unit.source: This property is used for a location search.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada para pesquisar um local.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> indicating where the search starts
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> que indica onde a pesquisa inicia

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting location of the search.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local de início da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pesquisar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle por local usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>método, ou você pode executar uma pesquisa de texto usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that indicates the starting location of the search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que indica o local de início da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text used to find an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto usado para localizar um item no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pesquisar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle por local usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>método, ou você pode executar uma pesquisa de texto usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The text used to find an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O texto usado para localizar um item no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controle.
